statements: DELETE FROM emergency_shelters WHERE city='Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM emergency_shelters WHERE shelter_id = 100 AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM emergency_shelters WHERE state = 'California' AND (capacity < 50 OR zip_code = '90210');
DELETE FROM displaced_individuals WHERE name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM displaced_individuals WHERE age >= 40 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM displaced_individuals WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM shelter_occupation WHERE occupation_id = 15 AND last_updated < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM displaced_individuals WHERE age > 60 AND shelter_id = 5;
DELETE FROM displaced_individuals WHERE shelter_id = 3 AND age > 60;
